name: Cook the Book: Piña Colada
description: This recipe is for a simple piña colada that uses only the freshest ingredients. While the recipe yields only one drink, it's easy to multiply. Whip up a batch this weekend and serve with your favorite chips and guacamole.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the pineapple juice, rum, cream of coconut, and heavy cream into a blender. Add the ice. Blend the ingredients until smooth. Pour into a chilled festive cocktail glass. Spear the fruit together with a toothpick. Garnish with the fruit spear.
